line_2: Death, and conquest, wait me now! —

line_1: Escaping from her guard she flies, when lo!
line_2: The doors, fast closing to exclude some foe,

line_1: Escaping from her guard she flies, when lo!
line_2: His form the bursting gates in awful beauty shew.

line_1: Hark! the Storm-daemon shrieks! — It thunders! — Lo!
line_2: How pale his cheeks, how wild his eye-balls grow,
